section.p: If you are an initiate it costs only 5 Shards to propitiate the twin gods of the sea. A non-initiate must pay 30 Shards.

Cross off the money and write Safety from Storms in the Blessings box on your Adventure Sheet. The blessing works by allowing you to ignore any one storm at sea. When you use the blessing, cross it off your Adventure Sheet.
You can have only one Safety from Storms blessing at any time. Once it is used up, you can return to any branch of the temple of Alvir and Valmir to buy a new one.
